ndmann55: Sorry to see this one go, but, as they say, when one door closes another door opens. At least we'll get a chance to see you do more stuff. I don't see you not working anytime soon. Also, I still want to call you Sarge, if that's ok.
colebyarnett: This show was awesome. The TV industry is bleeding out. All they care about is money, looking right past talent and potential for “ratings”. Friends didn’t have incredible ratings or numbers in the first season, I suppose they were less greedy and hasty then. Such a shame. Natalie, you are A+ talent, can’t wait to see what fun stuff you bring us.
collzorgs: Thank you for Abby’s. I loved every episode. I definitely cried tonight. Thank you for letting us in. Until we meet again... cheers.
jlaurin80: I’m so proud of @nataliemoralesloves and cast of Abby’s. I wish they gave the show another season. I look forward to your next project and I’m sure it will be another lead!
lbkogut: I'm going to miss this show.
tim.mcneil: I never felt that the show hit its full potential. Like a great recipe that had all the right ingredients but wasn’t fully baked. I was hoping it would hit it’s stride, but obviously they’re not gonna give you the time needed. 🤬. I’ve been a huge fan since The Middleman. You’ve finally landed a prime time network show and I have to imagine that the next one is around the corner. I can’t wait for what comes next!
auntietara8415: I'm going to miss watching Abby's.
mario_xgen: Even with the volume turned off one can tell what song you guys are singing. Wonderful show, best to all.

fgmccune: @nataliemoralesloves my wife and I LOVED the show! Thank you for an amazing season filled with numerous laughs!
d20_outlaw: One of the best parts of this show was the casting... EVERYONE was amazing and it’s sad to see it go. But thanks for all the hard work and the time you and everyone put into making us laugh!

billiamj: So going to miss the show.
